cyclone.name: CLAUDETTE
cyclone.current_location: about 290 mi SSE of Nantucket, Massachusetts
cyclone.trajectory: moving northeast and accelerating away from the U.S. East Coast toward the Canadian Maritimes
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: near or just south of Nova Scotia / Newfoundland (Canadian Maritimes)

weather_observation.impacted_coast: Off-shore western Atlantic waters from the Mid-Atlantic to Nova Scotia; primary coastal impact expected over Nova Scotia/Newfoundland
weather_observation.wind: No tropical-storm-force winds expected; only occasional breezy conditions or ocean swells possible along the New Jersey coast.
weather_observation.rainfall: None or very light showers possible, well below 4 inches.
weather_observation.other_hazards: Minor increase in Atlantic swells that could affect harbor approaches, but no direct hazardous weather expected at the port.
